column1: Source: USDA Branded Food Products Database Release July 2018 Software v.3.9.5 2018-08-15
Nutrient data for: CADBURY ROSES CHOCOLATE PIECES, UNPREPARED, GTIN: 07622210296092
Food Group:  Branded Food Products Database

Ingredients: MILK, sugar, glucose syrup, vegetable fats (palm, shea), cocoa butter, dried whey (from MILK), glucose-fructose syrup, cocoa mass, fat-reduced cocoa, HAZELNUTS, dried skimmed MILK, emulsifiers (E442, SOYA lecithin, E471), salt, flavourings, citric acid, sodium bicarbonate, colour (anthocyanins), humectant (glycerol), stabiliser (invertase).  MILK CHOCOLATE: MILK SOLIDS 14% MINIMUM.CONTAINS VEGETABLE FATS IN ADDITION TO COCOA BUTTER.  Occasionally it may be necessary to replace a particular chocolate with another of an equally high standard. Chocolates should be kept in a cool dry place. Exposure to heat or sunlight can cause the cocoa butter to move to the surface. This may result in a harmless white bloom developing on the chocolate. MAY CONTAIN OTHER NUTS. Date available: 11/10/2017 Date last updated by company: 12/29/2016
